description:
Moderate support for ankle sprains and fits comfortably inside your shoe. The neoprene sleeve and figure-8 elastic wrap work together to stabilize your ankle joint to prevent sudden twists or turns that could make injuries worse.

  • Small fits men’s shoe size 5-7, women’s 6-7
  • Medium fits men’s shoe size 7-10, women’s 8-10
  • Large fits men’s shoe size 11-14, women’s 10-13
  • If you have larger ankles, it’s recommended to go one size up
name: Pro-Tec Athletics Ankle Wrap
